de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore

Interface NetworkEnvironmentListener


  • public interface NetworkEnvironmentListener
    A interface to be notified about events in a NetworkEnvironment object.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    chrwuer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clientFound(Client c)
      Called when a new Client was found.
      void clientListCleared()
      Called when the list containing all available Clients was cleared.
      void clientLost(Client c)
      Called when a Client was lost.
      void clientSearchDone()
      Called when the NetworkEnvironment is now activly searching for new Clients.
      void clientSearchStarted()
      Called when the NetworkEnvironment is now activly searching for new Clients.
      void clientUpdated(Client c)
      Called when settings of a Client were changed.

    • Method Detail

      • clientFound

        void clientFound(Client c)
        Called when a new Client was found.
        Parameters:
        c - the newly found client

      • clientUpdated

        void clientUpdated(Client c)
        Called when settings of a Client were changed.
        Parameters:
        c - the updated client

      • clientLost

        void clientLost(Client c)
        Called when a Client was lost.
        Parameters:
        c - the lost client

      • clientListCleared

        void clientListCleared()
        Called when the list containing all available Clients was cleared.

      • clientSearchStarted

        void clientSearchStarted()
        Called when the NetworkEnvironment is now activly searching for new Clients. You may indicate this to the user.
        See Also:
        clientSearchDone()

      • clientSearchDone

        void clientSearchDone()
        Called when the NetworkEnvironment is now activly searching for new Clients. You may remove the indication to the user.
        See Also:
        clientSearchStarted()
